sentences.en: A: Two whiskey sours, a Scotch on the rocks, and a martini.
sentences.cn: 甲: 两杯威士忌加柠檬汁 、 一杯苏格兰威士忌加冰块 、 一杯马提尼鸡尾酒.

sentences.en: Almost everybody had a cigarette in one hand and a martini in the other.
sentences.cn: 几乎每个人都是一手夹着香烟，一手端着马提尼酒。

sentences.en: C: Will you have the martini straight up or on the rocks?
sentences.cn: 丙: 您要的马提尼酒,加不加冰块?

sentences.en: Can you remind me to buy a bottle of Martini?
sentences.cn: 你能提醒我买一瓶马提尼酒吗？

sentences.en: I must get out of these wet clothes and into a dry martini.
sentences.cn: 我必须脱掉这些湿衣服,然后来一杯干马提尼.

sentences.en: Jessie: I'll have a martini, Paul. It is Paul?
sentences.cn: 杰西: 我要马天尼, 保罗. 是叫保罗 吗 ?

sentences.en: On lighter occasions, these used to hold the perfect martini.
sentences.cn: 在有些情形, 这些很适合马蒂尼酒的存放.

sentences.en: Receptionist : So, that's a dry white wine and a Martini with ice.
sentences.cn: 接待员: 一杯乾白葡萄酒和一杯马丁尼加冰.

sentences.en: She asked for a dry martini.
sentences.cn: 她要了一杯干马提尼酒.

sentences.en: She expected him to ask for a scotch and was rather nonplussed when he asked her to mix him a martini and lemonade.
sentences.cn: 她料想他会要一杯苏格兰威士忌，所以当他请她调一杯马提尼酒加柠檬水时，她有点不知所措。

sentences.en: The olive is spoken of as the ruination of martini.
sentences.cn: 有人认为橄榄会使马丁尼酒走味.

sentences.en: This magnificent work of engineering prowess sports a Martini racing fascia.
sentences.cn: 这一宏伟工程的工作能力体育1马提尼赛车筋膜.

sentences.en: When he was full of martini, he reeled out.
sentences.cn: 当他喝足了马提尼洒时, 他才蹒跚而去.

sentences.en: Yes. This lady will a Manhattan and I'll a martini.
sentences.cn: 是的,这位女士要一杯曼哈顿酒,我要一杯马丁尼.
